value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Terran Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: A new and hopefully improved version of my guides for each race where I go over as many basics as possible while doing it live :)  I strongly believe that a super structured guide style is not very helpful compared to watching/playing the game actively.  Feedback is greatly appreciated. -- Watch live
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qL9Ns0ORolo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - What is a Gameplan? (Basic Guide & Tutorial)
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void - I go over the basics of what a gameplan in starcraft 2 is and how to put one together.  Note this is not a guide on WHAT gameplan you should be using as each race!
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/RkwtFcw8ztw" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Workers and Economy (Basic Guide & Tutorial)
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void - All races workers work the same (mule notwithstanding!)  Wiki on mining: http://wiki.teamliquid.net/starcraft2/Mining_Minerals
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TxTelFrmfKE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Zerg Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017)
value.excerpt: We go over the basic mechanics of zerg and show the importance of understanding at least some of what your opponent is doing.  This guide is meant for players with an understanding of the objectives of starcraft but without any strong direction or gameplan, especially for each specific race! -- Watch
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UdFTRsXMG7w" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft: Zerg Starter Guide #2 [BUILD ORDER] (Updated 2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: We go over a very basic Zerg build order designed to get you into the midgame with a good economy and options. These guides are in no particular order, nor are they meant for COMPLETELY NEW (less than 10 games) players, instead are all meant to help improve generally!
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jb-fmYlR6fI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Pig Coaches Winter! Learning Starcraft (Pro Coaches Grandmaster)
value.excerpt: Pig is a former professional player who now streams regularly and is one of the top 50 Grandmaster players on NA as random, and is still one of the best zergs in the world. Check him out:  https://www.youtube.com/user/PiGstarcraft https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig https://twitter.com/x5_PiG
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5EIBqtNrsuA" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Starcraft 2: Beginner Guides - Multiplayer Gameplay Settings Guide and Recommendations (Updated)
value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void. An updated version of the gameplay/controls and region settings guide for Legacy of the Void, going over the changes and reiterating my recommended settings, as well as the settings I use as a Grandmaster player.  Thanks for watching and hope you enjoy!  I am a Grandmasters

value.title: Starcraft 2 | Zerg vs Zerg Tech Switches, Build Order and Postgame Breakdown
value.excerpt: Deciding on the right tech and right options to win in Zerg vs Zerg.  Watch the stream - https://www.twitch.tv/wintergaming Tweeter - https://www.twitter.com/starcraftwinter Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/wintergaming

value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral's NEW Two Base Zerg Build Order!
value.excerpt: In a few of the professional matches of StarCraft 2 that I have casted recently, Serral goes for a build order that does not usually gets played at the highest level of the game. While most Zerg build orders still focus on quick getting the third Hatchery as soon as possible, Serral has been focusing

value.title: Minute Micro - Episode 30: Disruptor Splits
value.excerpt: Difficulty rating: 9/10  Minute Micro is a series of 1-minute videos explaining how to perform common micro techniques. This episode is on dodging disruptors.  twitch.tv/Quasarprintf
